snippet: LEAD: A baby born with most of his brain missing has become the first patient in a special ward set up to use such infants to supply organs for transplantation, hospital officials said today....
lead_paragraph: LEAD: A baby born with most of his brain missing has become the first patient in a special ward set up to use such infants to supply organs for transplantation, hospital officials said today.

headline.main: First Baby Is Placed in Organ-Donor Ward
